file_insights.changes_summary: Added aria-label attributes to improve accessibility for copy buttons and dropdown menu items

patterns_discovered: Adding accessibility attributes to interactive UI elements
Using conditional rendering for copy/copied state
gotchas_discovered: Some buttons were missing accessibility labels before this change
Original implementation did not have explicit aria-labels for screen readers
recommendations: Continue adding aria-labels to all interactive elements
Conduct an accessibility audit to ensure full WCAG compliance
Consider extracting aria-label text to a translations file for better internationalization
